summary: When a police inspector is murdered in hospital, the investigation led by detective Martin Beck uncovers reports of police misconduct and a possible revenge motive.
cast: Carl-Gustaf Lindstedt|Sven Wollter|Thomas Hellberg|Håkan Serner|Ingvar Hirdwall|Bellan Roos|Gus Dahlström|Harald Hamrell|Birgitta Valberg|Carl-Axel Heiknert|Torgny Anderberg|Folke Hjort|Eva Remaeus|Gunnel Wadner|Jesper Antell|Karin Bergstrand|Bo Holmström|Michaela Jolin|Dan Lindhe|Pundar-Bosse|Jan Sandquist|Lars Säfström|Johan Thorén|Torbjörn Tännsjö|Bo Widerberg|Johan Widerberg|Nina Widerberg|Jerry Wiklund
title: Un hombre en el tejado
